BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Mary A. Valverde to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment as the sculptor member of the New York City Art Commission, known as the Public Design Commission, pursuant to Sections 31 and 851 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mary A. Valverde, New York City Art Commission

Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Ellen Hoffman, President of the New York City Tax Commission
